testimonial-1-text: "Great company! Thanks to them I found a job at the Biedronka warehouse. The hiring process was easy and hassle-free. Thank you!"
testimonial-2-text: "Very satisfied with the cooperation! The team helped me with housing and employment in Poland. Everything went according to plan."
testimonial-3-text: "Highly recommend! The agency quickly found a job for me and offered good conditions. They are always in touch and answer any questions."
